sql.item: select to_char(start_time, 'dd"日" hh24"时"mi"分"') start_time, powercut_bts_num, gsm_out_bts_num, td_out_bts_num, lte_out_bts_num, light_stop_num, total_alarm_num, standard_alarm_num, nonproject_alarm_num, order_alarm_num, time_order_num, t1_order_num, t2_order_num, verified_order_num, send_order_alarm_rate from pro_focus_fault where start_time = (select max(start_time) from pro_focus_fault)
